handlers.code:
system.print("===== DISPLAY CONFIG CHECK =====")
system.print("")

if not _G.displays then
    system.print("ERROR: _G.displays is nil!")
    system.print("The screen configuration was not loaded.")
    system.print("You need to load ore-pure.lua in a library slot first.")
    unit.exit()
    return
end

local displayCount = 0
for slot, config in pairs(_G.displays) do
    displayCount = displayCount + 1
    system.print("Found display config for: " .. tostring(slot))
    system.print("  Tables: " .. #config.tables)
    
    local itemCount = 0
    for _, table in pairs(config.tables) do
        for _, row in pairs(table.rows) do
            for _, item in pairs(row) do
                itemCount = itemCount + 1
            end
        end
    end
    system.print("  Total items to display: " .. itemCount)
end

if displayCount == 0 then
    system.print("WARNING: _G.displays exists but is empty!")
    system.print("No screen configurations loaded.")
else
    system.print("")
    system.print("Display configuration loaded successfully!")
    system.print("Total displays configured: " .. displayCount)
end

system.print("")
if not _G.containers then
    system.print("Note: _G.containers is nil (optional)")
else
    local containerCount = 0
    for _ in pairs(_G.containers) do
        containerCount = containerCount + 1
    end
    system.print("_G.containers has " .. containerCount .. " entries")
end

unit.exit()
